scripts.build: npm run copymanifest && cross-env-shell "browserify -e src/index.ts -p tsify -o ../../dist/$npm_package_dapplets_name/$npm_package_dapplets_branch/$npm_package_version/index.js"
scripts.watch: npm run copymanifest && cross-env-shell "watchify -v -e src/index.ts -p tsify -o ../../dist/$npm_package_dapplets_name/$npm_package_dapplets_branch/$npm_package_version/index.js"
scripts.clean: (if exist lib rd /q /s lib) & (if exist dist rd /q /s dist)
